articles.author: Amanda Seitz
articles.title: RFK Jr.'s latest 'Make America Healthy Again' report calls for more scrutiny of vaccines and autism - AP News
articles.description: The Trump administration is urging public health agencies to prioritize investigations of vaccine injuries, prescription drug use and autism's causes. The call is part of a new “Make America Healthy Again” report released Tuesday. Overseen by Health Secretary…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) The Trump administration directed the nations public health and environmental agencies to prioritize investigations into vaccine injuries, prescription drug use and autisms causes in … [+4500 chars]
